litestep

Litestep is a highly configurable Mircosoft Windows shell replacement created by a team of programmers over the internet. It replaces the functionality of the windows start button, taskbar, system tray, and desktop icons, with it's own modules. Created to emulate the NeXT OS, Litestep's power lies in its modularity. For a much better look at what it can do, I suggest you visitlitestep.net .

These are a few of theLitestep themes that I've used over the past year. All of them are custom made from scratch and loosely based on eachother. The only thing not homemade would be the wallpaper on infinistep (the blue one). All zips are "snapshots" of my litestep directory at the time, not installing easily-configurable themes. If you wish to use any of my themes and aren't familiar with litestep, contact me and I can walk you through setting it up.
